SELECT zc.id, zc.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, zc.principal_name AS principalName, c.address, zc.create_time AS createTime FROM grid_zerodai_customer zc LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON zc.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 WHERE zc.deleted = 0
AND c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerName}, '%')
AND zc.principal_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{principalName}, '%')
ORDER BY zc.create_time DESC

SELECT zc.id, zc.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.address, c.manager_id AS managerId, zc.principal_name AS principalName, zc.gender, zc.phone, zc.business_situation AS businessSituation, zc.financing_situation AS financingSituation, zc.credit_demand AS creditDemand, zc.customer_no AS customerNo, zc.customer_classification AS customerClassification, zc.credit_amount AS creditAmount, zc.loan_amount AS loanAmount, zc.status, zc.photos, zc.employee_no AS employeeNo, zc.employee_name AS employeeName, zc.is_applied AS isApplied, zc.is_completed AS isCompleted, zc.create_time AS createTime, ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_zerodai_customer zc LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON zc.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 WHERE zc.id = #{id} AND zc.deleted = 0
